people_also_ask.question: Is Legend of Zelda Wind Waker on switch?
people_also_ask.heading: Although Wind Waker isn't available on the Switch, 3D artist Vitor Maccari shows off their impressive work with what it would look like.09-Aug-2021
people_also_ask.title: Wind Waker Remake Puts GameCube Classic On The Switch

people_also_ask.question: Why is Legend of Zelda Wind Waker so expensive?
people_also_ask.heading: The reason it's so expensive is because the GC version is the only release that game has had so far in the 10 years of it's existence. On top of that, the GC didn't exactly have a stellar install base, so most of the people who bought the wind waker were fans and have held on to their copy.31-Mar-2013
people_also_ask.title: WW-Wii U - Why is the Wind Waker So Expensive? | ZD Forums

people_also_ask.question: Is Zelda Wind Waker worth playing?
people_also_ask.heading: And while it didn't quite live up to the expectation of some, The Wind Waker absolutely holds up among the plethora of Zelda games. Above all, it is still a game undoubtedly worth any gamer's time in 2020. ... The game comes to a very satisfying conclusion after one of the series' most compelling journeys to date.13-Nov-2020
people_also_ask.title: Here's Why The Legend Of Zelda: Wind Waker Is Still Worth ...

people_also_ask.question: How long is the Legend of Zelda Wind Waker?
people_also_ask.heading: about 29 Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker is about 29 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 60 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker?

knowledge_panel.description: the legend of zelda: the wind waker is an action-adventure game developed and published by nintendo for the gamecube home video game console. the tenth installment in the legend of zelda series, it was released in japan in december 2002, in north america in march 2003, and in europe in may 2003. wikipedia
